Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am having an issue with the map view of KSP. The map view no longer shows the location of my craft. Is there a toggle to turn this back on? All I can see is the orbit and no craft. Please help!

Thanks!
Backspace to go back. Tab (shift-tab) to switch between planets (but careful with shift button). Double click on a planet to focus.

Hover your mouse over the top of the screen. A bunch of icons for different kinds of crafts should show up (things like probes, landers, stations, flags, asteroids, etc etc). Chances are, your craft (let's say it's a probe) is turned off. Simply click it's icon to turn it back on and you'll see it on the map again.
